description: Detects uses of the createdump.exe LOLOBIN utility to dump process memory
false_positives: Command lines that use the same flags
name: CreateDump Process Dump
query: ((process.executable.text:*\\createdump.exe OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"FX_VER_INTERNALNAME_STR") AND process.command_line.text:(*\ \-u\ * OR *\ \-\-full\ * OR *\ \-f\ * OR *\ \-\-name\ * OR *.dmp\ *))
author: Florian Roth
Nasreddine Bencherchali
